title: We Robot
description: Created in 2017, local association of robotic for youth, based in Gaillon, France. We participate to international and national competitions, winner of First Global Contest in Washington DC in 2017 and of World Adolescent Robotic Contest in Guyiang, China in 2018.

edito.title: Edito
edito.content:
The 2021-2022 season was a great success for the Saturday morning digital workshop. Five teenagers were very assiduous and we had a great time. The activity at the Jardins de bas community center was not very successful because of many interruptions: COVID but mostly because of a lack of supervisors. We did not participate in any robotics competition this year because of a lack of participants.

For this 2022-2023 school year we are using the same ingredients:

  • The Saturday digital workshop
  • The activity at the neighborhood house
  • The competitions if we manage to find motivated high school students
  • The continuation of the free membership for high school students who are interested in communication
Moreover, we will be present at the forum of associations of Gaillon on September 10, 2022 from 10 am in the gardens of the parking of the Castle.

You can contact us via our form and to join, it is done directly online here.

mission.title: Our goal
mission.content:
Our main purpose is the playful education of teenagers in the fields of STEAM.
We have teams of motivated students participate in national and internation robotic competitions.
At the same time, we propose an initiation into robotics for children from 8 to 12 years old.

support.title: Support us
support.content:
Robotics is an expensive activity. It requires a lot of hardware (engines, sensors, mechanical elements, electronic boards, tools, nuts and bolts, computer ...).
Moreover, travel, especially internationally, is not within everyone's reach.
That's why we are always looking for partners and financial support.
